org.apache.ambari.server.stack.upgrade

Class ConfigureTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.stack.upgrade.Task
      • org.apache.ambari.server.stack.upgrade.ServerSideActionTask
        • org.apache.ambari.server.stack.upgrade.ConfigureTask
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateAndConfigureTask

    public class ConfigureTask
extends ServerSideActionTask
    The ConfigureTask represents a configuration change. This task contains id of change. Change definitions are located in a separate file (config upgrade pack). IDs of change definitions share the same namespace within all stacks 

     
 <task xsi:type="configure" id="hdp_2_3_0_0-UpdateHiveConfig"/>

      • getId

        public String getId()
        This getter is intended to be used only from tests. In production, getConfigurationChanges() logic should be used instead
        Returns:
        id of config upgrade change definition as defined in upgrade pack

      • getSummary

        Returns:
        the task summary or null.

      • getConfigurationChanges

        public Map<String,String> getConfigurationChanges(Cluster cluster,
                                                  ConfigUpgradePack configUpgradePack)
        Gets a map containing the following properties pertaining to the configuration value to change:
        • PARAMETER_CONFIG_TYPE - the configuration type (ie hdfs-site)
        • PARAMETER_KEY_VALUE_PAIRS - key/value pairs for the configurations
        • PARAMETER_KEY_VALUE_PAIRS - key/value pairs for the configurations
        • PARAMETER_TRANSFERS - COPY/MOVE/DELETE changes
        • PARAMETER_REPLACEMENTS - value replacements
        Parameters:
        cluster - the cluster to use when retrieving conditional properties to test against (not null).
        Returns:
        the a map containing the changes to make. This could potentially be an empty map if no conditions are met. Callers should decide how to handle a configuration task that is unable to set any configuration values.
